title: プPrivacy Policy (Personal Information Protection Policy)｜BioGraph
content:
Marginal Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "we" or "our company") establishes this Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as "the Policy") regarding the handling of privacy information in the services provided on this website (hereinafter referred to as "the Services").

Marginal Co., Ltd. recognizes that customer's personal information is vital information constituting privacy in the implementation of internet-related business, homepage planning and production business, system development business, and smartphone application planning and development business. When handling personal information in our operations, we establish internal regulations for compliance with laws and regulations related to personal information and personal information protection, and we also establish organizational systems to ensure appropriate protection of personal information. By making efforts to properly protect personal information, we will respect our customers and respond to their expectations and trust in our company.

Collection, Use, and Provision of Personal Information

We will identify the purpose of use of personal information within the scope of our business activities and handle the collection, use, and provision of personal information fairly and appropriately to the extent necessary to achieve the intended purposes. We will also take measures to prevent the use of personal information beyond the intended purposes.

Compliance with Laws and Regulations

We will comply with laws and regulations related to personal information, guidelines set by the government, other standards, and social order and make efforts to ensure appropriate protection of personal information.

Appropriate Management of Personal Information

We are fully aware of the risks of unauthorized access, loss, destruction, alteration, leakage, etc., regarding the personal information we handle. We will implement reasonable security measures and take appropriate corrective actions in case of any issues.

Response to Inquiries

We will appropriately respond to inquiries from individuals regarding personal information we handle, including disclosure, correction, suspension of use, and complaints.

Continuous Improvement

We will establish management regulations and an organizational structure concerning the protection of personal information, thoroughly operate them among all employees, conduct periodic reviews, and strive for continuous improvement.

Established on April 19, 2017

Marginal Co., Ltd.
Representative Director, Hidetoshi Fujimoto


Personal Information Inquiry Desk
Personal Information Protection Manager, Hidenobu Kitagaw
TEL +81.82-961-6750

Handling of Personal Information by Our Company

At our company, we are committed to appropriately protecting personal information based on our "Personal Information Protection Policy." We hereby inform you of the personal information we acquire or hold for the purpose of our business operations as follows:

(1) Name of Personal Information Handling Business Operator

Marginal Co., Ltd.

(2) Purpose of Use of Personal Information

The purposes of using the personal information handled in our business activities are as follows:

① Personal Information Subject to Disclosure

Type of Personal Information Purpose of Use
Customer Information For business management, various communications, invoicing, and payment management.For business management, various communications, invoicing, and payment management.
Employee Information To be used for employee management tasks (such as business, labor, and personnel management, salary-related tasks, welfare-related tasks, etc.).
Inquirer Information To respond to inquiries.
Information of Individuals and Representatives (When requesting disclosure, etc.) To respond to requests for disclosure, etc.

Other purposes as specifically stated in writing.

② Non-disclosed Personal Information

Type of Personal Information Purpose of Use
Personal Information obtained
through entrusted operations		 To be used for responding to inquiries, providing business information, and answering questions via email or sending materials
Information obtained from job sites To determine and notify job applicants of the acceptance or rejection of their applications.
Applicant's personal information To arrange interviews with applicants and conduct online interviews using web cameras.

(3) Contact for Inquiries about Personal Information

Please contact the following [Inquiry Contact] for complaints, consultations, and inquiries regarding the handling of personal information, including personal information subject to disclosure.

(4) Name of Certified Personal Information Protection Organization to which we belong and contact for complaints

None

(5) Procedures for Disclosure, etc.

For personal information subject to disclosure, we will promptly respond to requests for disclosure, etc. (notification of purpose of use, disclosure, correction of content, addition or deletion, suspension of use, deletion, and suspension of third-party provision) from the individual concerned. If desired, we will respond within a reasonable period and scope after confirming that the requester is the individual or their representative.

(6) Method and Contact for Accepting Requests for Disclosure, etc.

Requests for disclosure, etc., regarding personal information subject to disclosure should be made to the reception desk below. Once we receive your request, we will send you our designated "Personal Information Disclosure Request Form" by mail, fax, email, etc. Please fill it out and return it along with the necessary documents (postage will be borne by the requester).
We will respond by providing written materials after confirming your identity (or your representative). Please note that we may not be able to comply with requests for disclosure, etc., through other methods.

(7) Acquisition of Personal Information and External Transmission of Information through Inconspicuous Methods

In this service, we automatically collect information such as internet domain names, IP addresses, and browsing activities on this service.
Cookies are limited to contents aimed at improving user-friendliness and do not contain personal information. Users can disable cookie functions through their browser settings, but this may affect the proper functionality of this service. In addition, the following information is externally transmitted through this service:
①Google AnalyticsGoogle Analytics:We use Google Analytics to understand the usage status of the site. Google Analytics collects information about users using cookies. Please refer to the Google Analytics terms of use for more information.
https://marketingplatform.google.com/about/analytics/terms/jp/
②Vonage Video API:We use Vonage Video API on some screens for video communication and transmit information necessary for video communication.

Inquiry Contact

Contact Name Personal Information Inquiry Desk
Contact Person Hidenobu Kitagawa, Personal Information Protection Manager
Address: 3F, 2-5-14 Kogonan, Nishi-ku, Hiroshima City, Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan
Phone: 082-961-6750
Email:info@marginal.co.jp
